comment._content: maybe this fellow?: The Rev. Dr. Henry J. Weber, 73 years old, was inaugurated yesterday afternoon as President of the Bloomfield Presbyterian Theological Seminary, Bloomfield, N.J. at a service in the German Presbyterian Church. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20615F93B5B157A... He seems to have lasted about 1 year in this position (judging from the tenure of his successor).
